break down.SENTENCE: My health broke down in the end.

break in.SENTENCE: He mostly walks around the roof trying to keep people from breaking in.

break up.SENTENCE: The pellets buried themselves in the wall of the barn and the meeting broke up hurriedly.

check out.SENTENCE: I went to the library and checked out a book because I was getting scared.

come along.SENTENCE: These young heroes wait stoically and without complaint for their one true wish to come along.

fall down.SENTENCE: To be afraid of this ridiculous dog when there was a tiger about was like being afraid of splinters when trees are falling down.

get in.SENTENCE: Once the vessel cracks, the light can get in.

go away.SENTENCE: I would do anything to make this go away.
